mapper.select: select teamcode from team where teamname=#{teamname}

select t1.emblem as emblem1, t1.teamname as teamName1, t2.emblem as emblem2, t2.teamname as teamName2, g.GAMEPLACE as gamePlace from gamerecord g, team t1 , team t2 where g.TEAMCODE=t1.TEAMCODE and g.TEAMCODE2=t2.TEAMCODE and g.sporttype='ì¶•êµ¬'
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from board order by boardDate desc)a) where rnum >=#{startRow} and rnum <=#{endRow}
